SELECT movie_name, opendate , nvl(yessales,0) sales_day, nvl(yesPer,0) seat_day , nvl(allsales,0) sales_allday, nvl(allPer,0) seat_allday , nvl(allScreen,0) screencnt, nvl(yesAllsales,0) sales_day_all , ROUND((nvl(yessales,0) / DECODE(nvl(yesAllsales,0), 0, 1, nvl(yesAllsales,0))) , 4) * 100 sales_day_ratio FROM movie m, ( SELECT movie_cd, count(*) allScreen FROM screen s, theater t, house h WHERE s.house_no = h.house_no AND t.thr_name = h.thr_name
GROUP BY movie_cd ) a, ( SELECT sum(pricesum) allsales, movie_cd, count(*) allPer FROM reservation r, screen s, theater t, house h WHERE r.screen_cd = s.screen_cd AND s.house_no = h.house_no AND t.thr_name = h.thr_name AND r.resdate < SYSDATE AND r.GB_CANCEL = 'N'
GROUP BY movie_cd ) b, ( SELECT sum(pricesum) yessales, movie_cd, count(*) yesPer FROM reservation r, screen s, theater t, house h WHERE r.screen_cd = s.screen_cd AND s.house_no = h.house_no AND t.thr_name = h.thr_name AND r.GB_CANCEL = 'N'
GROUP BY movie_cd ) c, ( SELECT sum(pricesum) yesAllsales FROM reservation r, screen s, theater t, house h WHERE r.screen_cd = s.screen_cd AND s.house_no = h.house_no AND t.thr_name = h.thr_name AND r.resdate < SYSDATE AND r.GB_CANCEL = 'N'
) d WHERE m.movie_cd = a.movie_cd(+) AND m.movie_cd = b.movie_cd(+) AND m.movie_cd = c.movie_cd(+) AND to_char(m.enddate, 'yyyyMMdd') >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd') ORDER BY sales_day DESC, sales_allday DESC
